title: League punished me for the client Crashing my PC
body: I was just starting a ranked game and as soon as I get in champ select the game crashes and i loose lp now im negative lp.  Can you guys investigate this issue with the client I have alkl current patches installed and league is the only game that i have this problem with.

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the dodge, and I'd like to help you get this fixed up.  Firstly, enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case your PC might be stressing too much during champ select.  Test it out in a custom game, and let me know how it goes.  Hit me up with more info and error messages if this continues!
